DepoCyte<tm tmtype="reg"/> National funding/access decisions

Scottish Medicines Consortium (SMC) Decisions

The Scottish Medicines Consortium has advised (July 2007) that liposomal cytarabine suspension (DepoCyte ) is not recommended for use within NHS Scotland for the intrathecal treatment of lymphomatous meningitis.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
title: DepoCyte
